RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 2 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FARTLEK led throughout, opened clear lead, driving. AWESOME BREAK stalked winner throughout, bid late to just miss. BARELYSTILLCOUNTS rated midpack early, mild bid, best of others. JOYRIDE raced wide throughout. FRONT PORCH up close early, no threat. MONEYFORNOTHING was close up early, came wide for the drive and tired. AMERICAN ROCKY never factor. PRETTY LOUD trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Break
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked winner, bid late, just missed

CASSIE'S RAINBOW vied up close early and weakened late. OUR FLIRTATION mild bid. CICI UNIFIED was back early, wide around the turn, no threat. ALGODONAL tired. WHAT A TART wide throughout.

AWESOME MOON was back early, rallied mildly to best others. MAGNIFICENT MADDY dueled with winner early, tired in the stretch. S S CITY SCOUT no threat. MACHEN MAYHEM tired throughout.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 2 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claimin g Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYRRH broke sharply to clear early early holding daylight to upper stretch widening under a drive. MON PARADIS gained contention on the turn vying five wide down the lane rallying late to save place. POETIC PURSUIT chased the pace racing between horses to upper stretch staying on to battle for minors. SWIFT RITHMS saved ground racing evenly through the stretch. CURIOSITY KILLS breaking slowly was rushed to contention inside flattening out down the lane. LADY MECHANIC was never involved. HALOFIED folded up on the turn.
